scripts.build:web: bun build src/web/main.tsx --outfile dist/public/app.js --target browser --format esm --minify
scripts.build:server: bun build src/server/index.ts --outfile dist/server.js --target bun --format esm --minify
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/public && bun run build:web && cp src/web/index.html dist/public/index.html && cp src/web/styles.css dist/public/styles.css && bun run build:server
scripts.bundle: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/server/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/darkhold
